qas.question: What city is considered to be a place that is popular with tourists?
Rather than host the old festivals, what type of events does Nanjing host each year?
What area holds the largest collection of plum blossoms in all of China?
Where do the tourists for the Plum Blossom Festival come from?
What festival involves kites and fruit trees?

answers.text: Nanjing Baima Peach Blossom and Kite Festival

context: Instead, <a0_0>Nanjing<a0_0/>, as a popular tourist destination, hosts <a1_0>a series of government-organised events<a1_0/> throughout the year. The annual International Plum Blossom Festival held in <a2_0>Plum Blossom Hill<a2_0/>, the largest plum collection in China, attracts thousands of tourists both <a3_0>domestically and internationally<a3_0/>. Other events include <a4_0>Nanjing Baima Peach Blossom and Kite Festival<a4_0/>, Jiangxin Zhou Fruit Festival and Linggu Temple Sweet Osmanthus Festival.
